content: Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message about setting the lifetime of files in a room. It appears on a settings panel or configuration screen, likely as part of options for room-related functionality. Translators should focus on conveying a sense of duration and file management.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'تعيين مدة حياة <1>{{data}}</1> الجميع الملفات في الغرفة' does not accurately convey the meaning of "Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room". The phrase 'الجميع الملفات' is grammatically incorrect and doesn't mean "all files".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تعيين مدة حياة <1>{{data}}</1> لجميع الملفات في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'الجميع الملفات' is grammatically incorrect. The correct way to say "all files" in this context is 'جميع الملفات'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: جميع الملفات

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "lifetime" is best translated as "ömrü" or "muddəti" in Azerbaijani, not directly as "istifadə müddəti" which emphasizes 'usage period'. While understandable, 'istifadə müddəti' subtly shifts the meaning. The current translation implies the duration of file usage, whereas the original refers to the overall lifespan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaqdakı bütün faylların ömrünü <1>{{data}}</1> olaraq təyin edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>{{data}}</1>` tag seems unnecessary and could be simplified.

The term "lifetime" is best translated as 'срок на валидност' or 'срок на живот' in this context, rather than just 'продължителност на живот'. While 'продължителност на живот' isn't *wrong*, it's less idiomatic for setting an expiry time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Задайте срок на валидност на <1>{{data}}</1> за всички файлове в стаята

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'lifetime' doesn't have a direct, commonly used equivalent in Czech when referring to files. 'Životnost' is technically correct but sounds awkward in this context. A better translation would convey the duration or expiry time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavení doby platnosti <1>{{data}}</1> pro všechny soubory v místnosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'pro všechny soubory' (for all files) is grammatically correct, but depending on the intended nuance, a more concise phrasing might be better.  Consider 'pro soubory' or 'všechny soubory'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavení doby platnosti <1>{{data}}</1> pro soubory v místnosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Set lifetime" is better translated as "Stellen Sie die Lebensdauer ein" or "Definieren Sie die Lebensdauer" rather than "Legen Sie die Lebensdauer von...fest". The current translation is a bit clunky and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'set'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stellen Sie die Lebensdauer von <1>{{data}}</1> für alle Dateien im Raum ein.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation 'Aseta <1>{{data}}</1> ikä kaikille huoneen tiedostoille' translates to 'Set <1>{{data}}</1> age for all room files'. The English implies setting a lifetime, not an age. 'Lifetime' translates to 'kesto' or 'elinkaari', not 'ikä'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta <1>{{data}}</1> kesto kaikille huoneen tiedostoille

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'elinkaari' is a more direct translation of 'lifetime', 'kesto' is more commonly used and understandable in this context. Using 'elinkaari' might sound overly formal or technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta <1>{{data}}</1> kesto kaikille huoneen tiedostoille

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ծառայության ժամկետը" (service lifetime) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'lifetime' in the context of files. It implies a service related to the file, not the file's existence or retention period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using something like "ժամկետը" (term), "կյանքի տևողությունը" (lifespan/duration), or "պահպանման ժամկետը" (retention period) depending on the intended meaning.  For example:  "Սահմանեք <1>{{data}}</1> ֆայլերի պահպանման ժամկետը սենյակի բոլոր ֆայլերի համար".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "lifetime" is better translated as "validità" or "scadenza" in the context of file retention or duration. 'Durata' is acceptable, but lacks the precision of the other options.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Imposta la validità di <1>{{data}}</1> per tutti i file nella stanza

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Set lifetime of" is not perfectly conveyed by "有効期限を".  While "有効期限" means expiration date/lifetime, "設定する" (to set) isn't the most natural way to express setting a lifetime. A more natural phrasing might be "有効期限を～に設定する" or simply "～に設定する".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルーム内のすべてのファイルの有効期限を～に設定

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content has `<1>{{data}}</1>`. The Japanese translation doesn't have the equivalent tagging for the variable. It should also include the same tags, or a matching tag convention, for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルーム内のすべてのファイルの有効期限を <1>{{data}}</1> に設定

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "룸에 있는 모든 파일에 대한 <1>{{data}}</1>의 수명 설정" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room'. It sounds a bit awkward in Korean.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 룸 내 모든 파일의 <1>{{data}}</1> 수명 설정

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags <1>{{data}}</1> are consistent in both English and Korean, which is good, but the Korean sentence structure might benefit from adjusting the placement of the tag for better readability.  It's currently positioned after '대한', which isn't ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 룸 내 모든 파일의 <1>{{data}}</1> 수명 설정

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "lifetime" is better translated as "darbības laiks" or "derīguma termiņš" in this context, rather than "kalpošanas laiks". "Kalpošanas laiks" is more commonly used for durable goods.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet <1>{{data}}</1> darbības laiku visiem telpā esošajiem failiem

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'lifetime' is better translated as 'expiration date' or 'validity period' in this context. 'Okres ważności' is accurate, but lacks the nuance of 'lifetime' meaning a period of usability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustaw datę ważności na <1>{{data}}</1> dla wszystkich plików w pokoju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'lifetime' is better translated as 'duração' or 'validade' in Portuguese, rather than a literal translation of 'tempo de vida'. 'Tempo de vida' can sound unnatural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina a duração de <1>{{data}}</1> para todos os arquivos na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'life time' is translated as 'vida útil'. While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation for 'lifetime' in this context (referring to data retention) would be 'tempo de vida'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Definir o tempo de vida de <1>{{data}}</1> para todos os arquivos na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Durata de viață de <1>{{data}}</1> pentru toate fișiere din sala' is not entirely accurate. 'Lifetime' implies a duration, but the Romanian phrasing directly translates it as 'life duration.' A more natural phrasing would convey the setting of a lifetime value.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Setează durata de viață de <1>{{data}}</1> pentru toate fișierele din sală

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation maintains the angle brackets '<1>' and '</1>'. While it's likely to preserve the formatting, it's crucial to confirm that this is intended and compatible with the Romanian interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that the angle brackets are appropriate for the target interface and intended to be preserved. If not, remove them or adapt them to a suitable Romanian format.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sala' is technically correct for 'room', but 'cameră' might be more common and sound more natural in this context. It depends on the specific register of language being used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'cameră' instead of 'sală' for a potentially more natural sounding translation, depending on the desired tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Установлен срок действия' (Srok deystviya is set) is passive and doesn't accurately reflect the active command 'Set lifetime'. A better translation would be more active, like 'Задать срок действия' (Zadat' srok deystviya) or 'Установить срок действия' (Ustanovit' srok deystviya) depending on the desired tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Задать срок действия <1>{{data}}</1> для всех файлов в комнате

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සියලු ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1> හි කාලායතනය සකසන්න" is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the action being performed *on* the files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලුම ගොනු වල <1>{{data}}</1> කාලායතනය සකසන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses a slightly different word order that changes the emphasis.  The English uses 'lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files', which implies that the lifetime is being assigned *to* the data. The Sinhala translation, as is, could be interpreted differently.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No direct correction possible; re-evaluate for semantic accuracy within the application context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Lifetime' is not accurately translated. 'Doba používania' implies a usage period, while 'lifetime' refers to the total duration something exists. A more accurate translation would be something like 'trvanie' or 'dĺžka životnosti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'doba používania' with 'trvanie' or 'dĺžka životnosti'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Set" is awkward. "Nastavitev" implies a setting, not an action of setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Postavi življenjsko dobo <1>{{data}}</1> za vse datoteke v sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets (<1> and </1>) are not standard Slovenian sentence structure and feel unnatural. While they preserve the original formatting, they may confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the brackets and integrating the `{{data}}` variable directly into the sentence if possible or adapting the phrasing to naturally incorporate it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Set lifetime" is better translated as "Postavi trajanje" or "Odredi trajanje" in Serbian (Cyrillic). "Postavi vreme trajanja" is a bit too literal and not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Postavi trajanje od <1>{{data}}</1> za sve fajlove u sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fajlove' is missing an accent mark. It should be 'фајлове'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Постави трајање од <1>{{data}}</1> за све фајлове у соби

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Postavi' (meaning 'set' in the sense of placing or assigning) doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Set' in this context. It implies an action, not a configuration setting. A more suitable translation would convey the idea of defining or configuring a lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Definiši vreme trajanja od <1>{{data}}</1> za sve fajlove u sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, 'vreme trajanja' sounds a bit clunky. A more fluent phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vreme trajanja od <1>{{data}}</1> za sve fajlove u sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "lifetime" is better translated as "geçerlilik süresi" or "saklama süresi" in Turkish, as "yaşam süresi" literally translates to lifespan and might be misleading in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odadaki bütün dosyalar için <1>{{data}}</1> geçerlilik süresi ayarlayın
